summary: The diff implements the majority of the requested requirements. All major pages, components, services, and state management are present. However, the Three.js/React Three Fiber animated background for the Landing Page was replaced with an SVG/CSS-only animation, and Framer Motion transitions are absent throughout. Required image assets are not included. The api.ts file is omitted from the diff due to truncation limits.

missing_requirements.requirement: Full-viewport 3D hero section with a Three.js / React Three Fiber animated particle or geometric background
missing_requirements.reason: The LandingPage.tsx uses a pure SVG/CSS animated background (AnimatedBackground component with SVG grid, floating dots, and CSS orb animations) instead of Three.js or React Three Fiber as explicitly required.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use smooth Framer Motion transitions for all page entrances, card appearances, and loading states
missing_requirements.reason: No Framer Motion imports or motion components are visible in any of the page or component files in the diff. CSS transitions and Tailwind animations are used instead.
The build request specifies two required image assets. Neither image file appears in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Export typed async functions for all 7 API calls from frontend/src/services/api.ts
missing_requirements.reason: The api.ts file is referenced throughout the codebase via imports but the file itself is omitted from the diff summary due to truncation limits, making it impossible to confirm full typed implementation.

hallucinated_features.description: Separate AutoPostPage at frontend/src/pages/AutoPostPage.tsx with its own route at /autopost
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-10 specifies that the Auto-Post button should be on the LinkedIn page (LinkedInPage.tsx), not a separate dedicated page. The diff creates a standalone AutoPostPage beyond what the spec describes.
The build request does not explicitly request a standalone GlassCard component file. It was created as a utility abstraction not mentioned in any requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: useToast hook extracted to a separate file at frontend/src/hooks/useToast.ts
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-12 specifies the useToast hook should be exposed from ToastProvider.tsx. The implementation additionally creates a separate hook file not described in the spec.
